data.title: Haoyu Dong at Microsoft Research
data.snippet:
I had the pleasure of co-founding the first Table Representation Learning (TRL) Workshop at NeurIPS (opens in new tab) in 2022 and have continued to co-organize it in 2023 and 2024. I also served on the steering committee for the Tabular Data Analysis (TaDA) workshop at VLDB’23. Recently, I co-presented a tutorial on “Large Language Models for Tabular Data” (opens in new tab) at the SIGIR’24 conference and gave a keynote on “Spreadsheet Intelligence and Tabular Data Analytics” at the VLDB’2024 TaDA workshop.

### Research areas

### Research groups

### Contact Haoyu Dong

Follow us:

Share this page: [...] ## Global

Portrait of Haoyu Dong

# Haoyu Dong

Senior Researcher

## About

I am Haoyu, a Senior Researcher at Microsoft Research and AI, specializing in LLMs for advancing table understanding and reasoning. My work spans both foundational research and practical applications in enterprise settings. Our paper Neural Formatting for Spreadsheet Tables was nominated for Best Full Research Paper at CIKM 2020, and our more recent project, SpreadsheetLLM, was featured as Hugging Face Paper of the Day (1st for the day (opens in new tab), 2nd for the month (opens in new tab)).

data.title: Vivid Activities to Celebrate the 20th Anniversary of Ha Dong's ...
data.snippet:
In 2024, Ha Dong District is organizing commemorative activities celebrating its 120th founding anniversary (December 6, 1904 – December 6, 2024) and 70th Liberation Day (October 6, 1954 – October 6, 2024), coinciding with the 70th Capital Liberation Day celebrations.

Street and road name plaque installation across Ha Dong district. [...] The district organizes numerous practical activities such as: Groundbreaking and inaugurating key projects and construction works: Nguyen Trai Park renovation and restoration project; Ha Dong Flower Garden improvement project; Ha Dong Secondary School construction project; Le Loi High School project groundbreaking; participation in the 1st Book and Reading Culture Festival in 2024 with the theme.. [...] The district organizes numerous practical activities such as: Groundbreaking and inaugurating key projects and construction works: Nguyen Trai Park renovation and restoration project; Ha Dong Flower Garden improvement project; Ha Dong Secondary School construction project; Le Loi High School project groundbreaking; participation in the 1st Book and Reading Culture Festival in 2024 with the theme “Books Open Worlds, Knowledge Opens Futures”. Collaborative documentary film production “Ha Dong 120 Years – Aspiration of Connection and Advancement”. Painting and photo exhibition commemorating Ha Dong’s 120th founding anniversary.

Painting and photo exhibition

# New Summer School: Posts and Telecommunications Institute of Technology (PTIT), Vietnam

With the aim of enhancing academic and cultural exchange among students from member countries of ASEA-UNINET, the Posts and Telecommunications Institute of Technology (PTIT) is planning to organise the PTIT International Summer School 2026, scheduled from June 15-30, 2026 at PTIT, Ha Dong Campus. The programme is designed for international undergraduate students and will include academic activities in the fields of:

Detailed programme information and materials are also available at the following

[](

link [...] [](

link

. Please note that, for ASEA-UNINET member universities, the application deadline will be extended to February 15. 2026. Additional materials or an official invitation letter in English may be provided upon request.

Source: PTIT Summer School: Global Innovation 2026 Guide
